entry.title: Flood Warning issued December 29 at 6:50AM PST until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Washington... Skokomish River At Potlatch affecting Mason County. .The Skokomish River continues to slowly recede, but will rise again with additional rainfall today and tonight.
